name: Project 668
goal:
- Employability: increase the employability of young graduates, interns, current and former EU Institutions trainees and young professionals by providing them with personal and professional development opportunities and activities

- Collaboration: increase cooperation with individuals and organisations in Europe sharing the same values and goals

- #SharingIsCaring: Build a community where #SharingIsCaring is at the heart of all the activities

- Advocacy: stand up for fair working conditions and make the fight against youth unemployment a priority
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Youth Guarantee
- European Youth Initiative
- European Quality Framework for Internships
- European Solidarity Corps
